long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Effortlessly add custom HTTP headers to every request with the Header Modifier Chrome Extension, designed for seamless testing and debugging of API interactions. Perfect for developers, testers, and power users, this extension lets you configure headers dynamically, enabling efficient HTTP header management and streamlining your development and debug workflow.

Key Features:

	•	Custom HTTP Headers: Easily insert any header name and value, such as authentication tokens, tracking headers, or CORS configurations, allowing you to meet server requirements for smoother API testing.
	•	Dynamic Debugging: Modify headers on-the-fly without altering server code to troubleshoot issues like CORS errors, missing headers, or inconsistent API responses.
	•	Efficient Header Management: Test various header configurations in real-time, simulating different client setups or environments. Quickly clear or modify individual headers to adapt to changing test cases or specific debugging scenarios.
	•	One-Click Clear: Reset all headers with a single click, returning to a clean state for new testing phases or simplified setup.

Debugging Made Easy:

This extension is specifically crafted to help you identify and reproduce complex bugs, including:

	1.	Missing HTTP Headers: Quickly add required headers for API testing, perfect when servers demand specific values (e.g., for authentication or tracking).
	2.	Dynamic Debugging: Experiment with header values to pinpoint and resolve issues like CORS errors or faulty API responses without modifying your server setup.
	3.	Header Configuration Testing: Simulate different client setups in real-time, making it ideal for diverse API development needs.

Streamline your API testing and debugging process with Header Modifier, the all-in-one tool for powerful, flexible HTTP header management. Download now and simplify your web request customization!
